TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Kalito'od, title = Kalito'od, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kalito'od} }

S.FORM: Kalito'od Itiniay i Beinan Cen no Taitung ko Kalito'od a niyaro', 97 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 276 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 91 ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 251 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 9 ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 25 ko tamdaw. O pa sin to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis79 , Bunun1 , Puyuma7 , roma3 . Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
